test.name: Contact Us Test Case

kw.name: Given Open Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Opens the home page of the application.

kw.name: Then Verify Home Page Title
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Verifies that the home page title is correct.

kw.name: When Go to Contact Us page
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
Navigates to the Contact Us page.

kw.name: And Verify Contact Us Page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that the Contact Us page is displayed correctly.

kw.name: Then Enter Contact Details
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'God bless you' into text field 'id=input-enquiry'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Fills in the contact form with the provided details.

kw.name: And Verify Contact Us Form Submission
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//p[text()='Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner!']' contains text 'Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner!'.
kw.arg: Your enquiry has been successfully sent to the store owner!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that the contact form submission was successful.

test.doc: This test case verifies the Contact Us functionality.
